message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Context check + post-vote recap to team-lead">
Context window check. Reply to team-lead with:

1. **Files in context:** Confirm you have all 8+1 source essays loaded. List whose Analysis Report or Memo you have (by name, e.g. "my own Metaphysics Analysis Report").

2. **What happened since the Reporting-Protocol vote:** Briefly list the key events/decisions you witnessed since the 11/11 vote to move "What to Report" to a standalone file. Just bullet points, no commentary.

Reply directly to team-lead. Brief answers only.
</teammate-message>

input.summary: Context check: files loaded and post-vote recap
input.content:
**1. Files in context:**

I do NOT have the 8+1 source essays loaded. I have read the following files in this session:

- Standby Reader / Reporting-Protocol.md
- Standby Reader / Profile.md
- Translator / Draft / Translators-Preface.md (DRAFT-R3)
- Translator / Draft / Essay4-DaoDeRenYiLi.md (DRAFT-R1)
- Translator / Draft / Glossary-Introduction.md (DRAFT-R2)
- Translator / Profile.md
- Translator / Memo.md (partial — lines 1-50, 350-476)
- Editor / Afterword-Blueprint.md
- Editor / Memo.md (lines 1-100)

I have NOT read any source essays or any Analysis Reports in this session. I have file paths for all of them from the Translator Profile and workspace listing.

**2. Key events since the 11/11 Reporting-Protocol vote:**

This session is a context continuation — the previous session ran out of context. I was reconstituted from a summary. Based on what I can see from file timestamps and system reminders:

- Reporting-Protocol.md was written to Standby Reader directory (FINAL, pending implementation)
- Standby Reader Profile.md was finalized (11/11 unanimous)
- Translator's Preface revised to DRAFT-R3 (spoiler resolution, 11/11 consensus)
- Glossary Introduction moved to standalone file (DRAFT-R2, per Option B)
- Afterword Blueprint finalized (11/11 consensus) — comprehensive 6-section plan with all expert amendments
- Editor sent a message mapping feedback to the compiled Reporting Protocol plan (the message I just received as carryover)

I did not witness these events live — I reconstructed them from file contents and metadata. My actual memory of the previous session's events was lost at context boundary.
